Usage instructions

Click to show dialog for this site to request access to your MetaMask web-browser extension.

Input text you wish to sign with your primary private key/address,

Click to have this site submit signature request to your MetaMask web-browser extension.

Warnings and notes

Signing data with keys crypto-coin wallet(s) has some risks some, but not all, of which will be listed in the following section(s).

As always treat anything you consume online with a health level of scepticism ;-)

Do and do not-s of using tools provided

Do consider tipping the author S0AndS0.eth if you found these tools useful.

Do consider adding a nonce, or other pseudo-random data to "Input text" to be signed.

Do not sign data from untrusted parties.

Do not blame anyone but yourself if you sign "Input text" that drains your wallet and/or breaches your privacy.

Do not treat anything on this site as advice of a financial, legal, and/or professional advice.
